body: I'm loving this story so far. This is probably one of my favorite softcore webtoons I've come across. I would love to see the MC build a nice relationship with the judo fan of his since they seem to like each other a lot and also fuck the female trainer that has had her eyes on him. Love to see that she is getting a little jealous as well. Maybe if he is really lucky he can have a three some with them of a foursome including the dark skinned boss.
I can't fap to this! It's way too funny for me! Ar Ar Ar Arrr!
